title: First Love And Other Fascinating Stories of Spanish Life (Version 2)
description:
'First Love'
Think of the most beautiful picture you've ever seen...

'An Andalusian Duel'
Two men, destined to die over a woman. But what does she have to say about it?

'Maraquita the Bald'
A woman sacrifices her greatest asset to save her father. But from such sacrifice, come surprises.

'The Love of Clotilde'
His greatest triumph: his theatrical masterpiece to be staged! And with the love of his life in the leading role, what could go wrong?

'Captain Veneno's Proposal of Marriage'
Not any old proposal...  - Summary by The Reader

authors.name: Pedro Antonio de Alarcón y Ariza

sections.title: An Andalusian Duel by Serafin Estebanez Calderon
Maraquita the Bald by Juan Eugenio Hartzenbusch
The Love of Clotilde by Armando Palacio Valdés
Captain Veneno's Proposal of Marriage by Pedro Antonio de Alarcón
